text: Much as a harsh heatwave dries a well, poor portents have left your vault empty.
Akin to the glint of gold, your ambition sparkles and drives you to seek ever more.
You have had a taste of luxury and wealth, and it is as comfortable as fine silk on your skin. You yearn for more... ever more.

Your coffers spill forth with copper and silver, and precious gems and fabrics adorn your carriage. You can sense greedy eyes staring at your success. Any jealous thieves and potential robbers must be dealt with!
Your fortune is truly vast. Every village under your rule is lavish, every peasant lives as a king. Just as the waterways of China flow out of your domain, the wealth of China flows back to you.
You control the waterways of China, you've declared yourself Lord of the Sources, and so befitting you must create the richest land in the world.
